# HKWorkoutSessionLocationType.indoor

**Case**

The workout session is indoors.

## Declaration

```swift
case indoor
```

## Constants

- **HKWorkoutSessionLocationType.unknown**: It is not known whether the workout session is taking place indoors or outdoors.
- **HKWorkoutSessionLocationType.outdoor**: The workout session is outdoors.

items.description: It is not known whether the workout session is taking place indoors or outdoors.
